pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## pytest capture WarningsThis is a pytest plugin to collect and print a summary of all the warnings encountered during test execution and save them in a file.# Installation pip install pytest-capture-warnings# Usage pytest --output <output_file> <file_to_test> or CAPTURE_WARNINGS_OUTPUT=<output_file> pytest <files_to_test># Flake8 Format The output file is formatted on a flake8 format <filename/path>:<line number>:<character number>:<warning message>
